metadata.Title: CVE-2013-7445 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The Direct Rendering Manager (DRM) subsystem in the Linux kernel through4.x mishandles requests for Graphics Execution Manager (GEM) objects, whichallows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (memoryconsumption) via an application that processes graphics data, asdemonstrated by JavaScript code that creates many CANVAS elements forrendering by Chrome or Firefox.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
